description: Luke Desmond was sadistic enough already, so when he brings out his zapper poor Aiden really starts to sweat. Bound up in the sling, Luke takes pleasure out of torturing Aiden's feet with his new toy, as well as the pinwheel and lots of wax. The sound of his boys screaming over excites Luke to the point where he can't help himself and pounds Aiden's ass before shooting all over his worn out boy.
title: Aiden Jason & Luke Desmond
